
.. code-block:: bash

    $ echo 'Pining for the fjords'
    Pining for the fjords

Pipes don't work, so we can't redirect this value into a file. But we can
write a file with python:

.. code-block:: bash

    $ python -c \
    >     "with open('tmp.txt', 'w+') as f: f.write('Pushing up daisies')"

    $ cat tmp.txt
    Pushing up daisies
